We were able to finally send in the =

>
> =
On 4/13/10 11:58 AM, steve@... wrote:
> > On 4/10/10 6:01 PM, Rajkumar wrot=
e:
> >> Thanks for the information Gordon.
> >>
> >> I finally found that t=
he HttpClient we are using supports https. When i
> >> invoke heritrix from=
 the client, i get the blocking response with the
> >> challenge informatio=
n.
> >>
> >> As i searched through the internet i see that we will have to =
send in
> >> the authorization digest information once we get the blocking =
response.
> >>
> >> Is there someone who has already done this before.
> >
=
> >
> > i believe there are examples of this in the H3 API Guide
> > https:=
//webarchive.jira.com/wiki/x/ZoJX
> 
> Indeed. The examples in the API guid=
e all use the command-line 'curl' 
> utility, but there's also a 'libcurl' =
for embedding curl functionality 
> in other programs. And, most other HTTP=
 client libraries will offer 
> support for supplying digest-authentication=
 credentials.
> 
> - Gordon @ IA
